list.name: Default
list.comment: Added screen for select the host device

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the Android dependencies of the project.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles all variants of all applications and secondary packages.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the unit tests for the Debug build.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the unit tests for the Release build.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

option.name: description
option.value: Installs and runs the tests for Debug build on connected devices.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs all device checks on currently connected devices.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs all device checks using Device Providers and Test Servers.

option.name: description
option.value: Installs the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs lint on the Debug build.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs lint on the Release build.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs lint on just the fatal issues in the Release build.

option.name: description
option.value: Creates a version of android.jar that's suitable for unit tests.

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the signing info for each variant.

option.name: description
option.value: Run unit tests for the Debug build.

option.name: description
option.value: Run unit tests for the Release build.

option.name: description
option.value: Uninstalls the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

task.summary: Added Error Handling if connecting to SSH does not work
Making device directory independent of commands for flexibility
Added games cards to games fragment
Store games to disk and added refresh button
Added Credits Fragment and Jazzy listview to app
Tweaked logic for LaunchFragment Ip search
Added Callback for Starting a game. Hide action bar when user scrolls.
Added screen for select the host device
